title: Picslink
description: Image-sharing website with paths to purchasing options, which allows users to create posts and make edits. A Pinterest-inspired image-sharing community. Built with Python to pull user data for 95 posts from 36 current users stored in a PostgreSQL database. Created interface with Flask, SQLAlchemy, and HTML/CSS because of the flexibility that is offered with Jinja and WTForms. Leveraged Git and GitHub in the Terminal to deploy application with Heroku.

title: Quotable
description: Quote-sharing site with browsing, searching, favoriting, and posting options. Backend built with Node.js and Express.js. Built with Javascript to call data with SQL queries from my own API and external API: They Said SoÂ®. Frontend built with React for its styling flexibility offered with its component-based design and easy testing capability. Leveraged Git and GitHub in the Terminal to deploy site with Surge.

title: Madlibs
description: Simple React project demonstrating a Madlibs game, deployed with Surge.

title: Weather App React
description: React Development course to create a weather application to access current weather data for any location including over 200,000 cities. Simple application for users to view current weather in the cities the user searches for. Built SheCodes Plus project in React framework using Javascript, React, Node, HTML/CSS, Netlify.

title: Weather App
description: Weather application with searching capability by city name. Weather tool for users to view current and forecasted weather in their exact location and cities the user searches for. Built with Javascript, HTML, and CSS. Open-sourced on GitHub and hosted on Netlify.
